resources.string: To learn more about TEDx Cape Town or to volunteer, speak to event organisers, or subscribe to news about the event, please visit our website, TEDxCapeTown.org

Andrew Petty

Richard JE Cooke
Alex Leibhammer
Andy Spicket

This open source application was written for TEDx Cape Town 2014. We intend it to be reused and extended by other TEDx organisers, or for other similar events.\n\nThe freely available code for this application, the iOS version, and the PHP and MySQL server it uses, are all available and explained on our GitHub site, GitHub.com/TEDxCT
